member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.EditorRequiredAttribute
member.summary:
Specifies that the component parameter is required to be provided by the user when authoring it in the editor.
If a value for this parameter is not provided, editors or build tools may provide warnings indicating the user to specify a value. This attribute is only valid on properties marked with .
